鬞鬞鬞

鬞字的基本解释

鬞
nóng
毛发多。
〔鬞鬤〕头发散乱。
头发长。

鬞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［náng］
［《廣韻》女江切，平江，娘。］
(1)见“鬞鬤”。
(2)毛发多。
(3)头发长。
[②]［nàng］
［《集韻》尼降切，去絳，娘。］
头发散乱。

鬞字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【髟字部】　鬞； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1456第52
【廣韻】女容切【集韻】尼容切，?音醲。【埤蒼】鬞鬞，亂髮。【玉篇】毛多也。　又【類篇】髮長也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?濃江切，音䁸。義同。或作?。　又【集韻】奴凍切，音齈。又尼降切，音?。義?同。

鬞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鬞字的起名意思

暂无。

Gaze
Basic explanation of words
Gaze
nóng
There are more hairs.
〔鬞鬤〕The hair is unruly.
Hair is long.
Gaze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［náng］
["Guangyun" female Jiangqie, Pingjiang, mother. ]
(1) See "鬞鬤".
(2) There are more hairs.
(3) Long hair.
[②]［nàng］
["Ji Yun" Ni drops and cuts, goes to Jiang, mother. ]
The hair is messy.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【Xianzi Department】　鬞; Kangxi strokes: 23; Page number: page 1456 52
[Guangyun] Female Rongqie [Jiyun] Ni Rongqie,? 【Pi Cang】has a messy hair. [Jade articles] There are too many hairs.　[Classes] Hair is also long.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Nongjiang cut, sound. The same meaning. Or for?.　 [Ji Yun] Slave frozen and cut, the sound is staggering. Ni Jiangqi again, the tone?. Righteous? Same.
